DOC.detailed_description: Screening genetic/chromosomal abnormality become frequent pre-natally post-natally . Therefore , plan review outcomes newborns genetic abnormality cardiac surgery compare newborn without genetic abnormality cardiac surgery . We wish examine outcome follow cardiac surgery newborns genetic abnormality compare newborn without genetic abnormality . We compare morality rate co-morbidities group . We retrospectively review cardiac surgical database patient medical record neonate ( newborn < 30 day age ) underwent cardiac surgery January 1 , 2002 May 31 , 2006 Children 's Healthcare Atlanta . We plan collect data approximately 1000 patient include date birth , age , weight , gestation , prenatal diagnosis , genetic abnormality , cardiac defect , surgery , operative detail , pre-op post-op complication , length time ventilator , hospital stay mortality patient . We review patient outcome data available initial surgery May 31 , 2006 . No patient contact .
